definition.text: Trading systems are the heart and soul of systematic trading, as they concentrate the biggest chunk of trading intelligence.

paragraphs.text: The rest of the infrastructure built into Superalgos—data mining and visualization, the trading bot and trading engine, the visual strategy designer and debugger—all have significant equity in the intelligence pie, but it's fair to argue that they were developed to support the design, testing, and deployment of trading systems!
This first tutorial explains how Superalgos views and handles a Trading System. The rest of the tutorials in the series teach you how to build them!
